TextView.android:text: Ivan Ivanovitch begins telling the story of his brother Nikolay. [1] Nikolay worked in a government office but longed to escape to the countryside and buy a small farm, dreaming of eating his own vegetables and living a simple life surrounded by nature. [2] However, Ivan did not share his brother's desire to isolate himself on a farm, believing a person needs the whole world, not just a small plot of land, to fully develop themselves. [3] Nikolay was particularly fixated on the idea of owning gooseberry bushes as part of his imagined idyllic country home.
